select tablecode,colkey,expression,colname,collength,iscond,isshow,issort,isapply,isdefaultfield,fieldtype,flag,creator,createdate,modifier,modifydate,dispseq from t12_programa_cols
tablecode = #tablecode#
flag = #flag#
order by dispseq

select t1.tablecode,t1.colkey,t1.expression,t1.colname,t1.collength,t1.iscond,t1.isshow,t1.issort,t1.isapply,t1.isdefaultfield,t1.fieldtype,t1.flag,t1.creator,t1.createdate,t1.modifier,t1.modifydate,t1.dispseq from t12_programa_cols t1,t12_programa_table_rel t2 where t1.tablecode = t2.tablecode and t2.programakey=#programakey# and (t1.flag <> '2' or t1.flag is null) order by t1.dispseq

select t1.tablecode,t1.colkey,t1.expression,t1.colname,t1.collength,t1.iscond,t1.isshow,t1.issort,t1.isapply,t1.isdefaultfield,t1.fieldtype,t1.flag,t1.creator,t1.createdate,t1.modifier,t1.modifydate,t1.dispseq,t1.isrelevance,t1.relevancetype ,t1.parmtype,t1.sysinparmkey,t1.parmintype,t1.targetcde,t1.keyvisible,t1.isdefault,t1.defaultvalue from t12_programa_cols t1,t12_programa_table_rel t2 where t1.tablecode = t2.tablecode and (t1.flag <> '2' or t1.flag is null)
t2.programakey = #programakey#
t1.tablecode = #tablecode#
isshow = #isshow#
isdefaultfield = #isdefaultfield#
iscond = #iscond#
issort = #issort#
isapply = #isapply#
order by t1.isshow desc,t1.dispseq asc

select t1.tablecode,t1.colkey,t1.expression,t1.colname,t1.collength,t1.iscond,t1.isshow,t1.issort,t1.isapply,t1.isdefaultfield,t1.fieldtype,t1.flag,t1.creator,t1.createdate,t1.modifier,t1.modifydate,t1.dispseq,t1.isrelevance,t1.relevancetype ,t1.parmtype,t1.sysinparmkey,t1.parmintype,t1.targetcde,t1.keyvisible,t1.isdefault,t1.defaultvalue from t12_programa_cols t1,t12_programa_table_rel t2 where t1.tablecode = t2.tablecode and (t1.flag <> '2' or t1.flag is null)
t2.programakey = #programakey#
t1.tablecode = #tablecode#
(isshow = #isshow# or (ISSHOW = '0' and T1.ISDEFAULTFIELD <> '1'))
isdefaultfield = #isdefaultfield#
iscond = #iscond#
issort = #issort#
isapply = #isapply#
order by t1.isshow desc,t1.dispseq asc

select count(*) from t12_programa_cols
tablecode = #tablecode#
flag = #flag#

update T12_programa_cols set expression=#expression#,colname=#colname#,collength=#collength#,iscond=#iscond#,isshow=#isshow#,issort=#issort#,isapply=#isapply#,isdefaultfield=#isdefaultfield#,fieldtype=#fieldtype#,flag=#flag#,creator=#creator#,createdate=#createdate#,modifier=#modifier#,modifydate=#modifydate# where colkey=#colkey# and tablecode=#tablecode#

update T12_programa_cols set colname=#colname#,collength=#collength#,iscond=#iscond#,isshow=#isshow#,issort=#issort#,modifier=#modifier#,modifydate=#modifydate#,dispseq=#dispseq#,isrelevance=#isrelevance#,relevancetype=#relevancetype# where colkey=#colkey# and tablecode=#tablecode#

update t12_programa_cols t1 set t1.flag='2',t1.modifier=#modifier#,t1.modifydate=#modifydate# where exists ( select 1 from t12_programa_table_rel t2,t12_programa_table t3 where t2.programakey = #programakey# and t2.tablecode = t1.tablecode and t2.tablecode = t3.tablecode )
update t12_programa_cols t1 set t1.flag='2',t1.modifier=#modifier#,t1.modifydate=#modifydate# where t1.tablecode=#tablecode# and t1.isdefaultfield='0' and t1.colkey not in ($colkey$)
select * from T12_programa_cols where tablecode=#tablecode# and colkey=#colkey#

update T12_programa_cols set parmtype=#parmtype#,sysinparmkey=#sysinparmkey#,parmintype=#parmintype#,targetcde=#targetcde#,keyvisible=#keyvisible#,isdefault=#isdefault#,defaultvalue=#defaultvalue# where colkey=#colkey# and tablecode=#tablecode#
